name: Cemetery Sweep
description:
It's 20 seconds before midnight on October 31. The grim reaper must use this time allotted to sweep up as much material from the cemetery as possible, as while avoiding the dreaded witch.

Movement Controls: W,A,S,D

Point Value:

Trees: 1 point

Jack 'O Lanterns: 2 points

Gravestones: 3 points

Ghosts: 5 points

Colliding with the witch deducts 2 points from score.

This game was created for the "20 Second Game Jam" with the idea of creating a fully functional video game that lasts only 20 seconds from start to finish. The pixel art assets are from Tyler Warren's Halloween Asset pack (link below). Game programming was done using Construct 3 and sound effects created using JSFXR.

https://tylerjwarren.itch.io

https://sfxr.me/
